definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

sentences.english: As a young man how Shou Dele, a lot Maopian see.
sentences.chinese: 做爲一個年輕人怎麼受得了，就下了很多毛片看。

sentences.english: She doubted if she could bear it.
sentences.chinese: 她懷疑自己能否禁受得了。

sentences.english: Becky's face paled, but she thought she could.
sentences.chinese: 42貝基的臉色發白，可她覺得她能受得了。

sentences.english: Think how could the flatfoot on duty bear such a cold.
sentences.chinese: 想想那值勤的巡警怎麼受得了這麼冷的天。

sentences.english: Brother's little brother, "that" when you, can you bear?
sentences.chinese: 哥的小弟弟“那個”你的時候，你能不能受得了？

sentences.english: Could you please put up with that woman?
sentences.chinese: 你能受得了那個女人嗎？

sentences.english: Becky, can you bear it if I tell you something?
sentences.chinese: 貝基，如果我告訴你，你受得了嗎？

sentences.english: What might be bearable to someone else, may not be bearable to you.
sentences.chinese: 別人能夠忍受的事情，你不一定能夠忍受得了。

sentences.english: How Jane could bear it at all, was astonishing to Emma.
sentences.chinese: 簡怎麼能受得了這一切，真叫愛瑪感到喫驚。

sentences.english: I don't know how you stick that job .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道那活兒你怎麼受得了。

sentences.english: I can stand to be around him now.
sentences.chinese: 我能忍受得了他的存在了。

sentences.english: We should work till 12:00 at noon every day, under this situation, nobody can bear it.
sentences.chinese: 你說每天都得幹到中午12點才下班，誰受得了。
你們怎麼能忍受得了呢？

sentences.english: I did not think I could afford to lose my post.
sentences.chinese: 我想我不能忍受得了失去這個職位。

sentences.english: If you will bear all this, I will help you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能忍受得了這些苦痛的話，我就可以幫助你。

sentences.english: Thank you, yeobo. Thanks for you can suffer my eccentric temper.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你受得了我古怪的脾氣。
